A

addManager(Manager) - Method in class valerioFarriciello.Model.Team
Sets the manager pointer to the new manager object and the team pointer (inside the Manager class)
pointing at THIS team.
addManagerToATeam(String, String) - Method in class valerioFarriciello.Model.Database
Assigns a manager to a team in the database
addPlayer(Player) - Method in class valerioFarriciello.Model.Team
If the team is not full and the player is not already in the team, it will add the Player object to its arrayList of players.
addPlayerToATeam(String, String) - Method in class valerioFarriciello.Model.Database
Adds a new instance of PlayerAssignment inside the database
AddTab - Class in valerioFarriciello.View
Class responsible to get the values for players and managers assignments
AddTab(League) - Constructor for class valerioFarriciello.View.AddTab
Generates a gridpane that contains 2 buttons, one for add a manger to a team and
the other one to add a manager to a team.
alertBox(String, String, String) - Static method in class valerioFarriciello.View.Main
A simple alert box that is used multiple times to communicate with the user.
assignManagerToATeam(Manager, Team) - Method in class valerioFarriciello.Controller.League
Responsible to validate the manager assignment for the team.
assignPlayerToATeam(Player, Team) - Method in class valerioFarriciello.Controller.League
This method is responsible to validate the player assignment to a team.
